channel.title: kpodemski on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in kpodemski on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - September
item.description: In this article, delve into September’s updates and news from the project. As well as Hacktoberfest 2023’s kick off, offering a month-long celebration of open-source contributions. Keep reading for more information. PrestaShop 8.1.2 In September, the project saw the release of PrestaShop 8.1.2. This second patch for the 8.1 series brings two security fixes and addresses over 30 bugs. The release also includes minor enhancements, particularly to the new product page and the multi-format image generation system.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - September 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on September 13th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:30 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:28 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1.1, 8.0.5 and 1.7.8.10 08:56 Demo: changes in the developer documentation by @thomasnares 43:00 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - August
item.description: A little later than usual, discover the latest happenings in the PrestaShop Project for August 2023. We had a productive month, successfully merging more than 240 pull requests and releasing PrestaShop 8.1.1 and some security patches. Read on to find out more! PrestaShop 8.1.1, 8.0.5, 1.7.8.10 The first patch for PrestaShop 8.1 and security patches for 8.0.5 and 1.7.8.10 are all available to download. You can read the details about these versions in the release notes:

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The eighth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, September 13th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. If you have questions related to the open source project, feel free to let us know in advance using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - July 2023
item.description: Read about what has been going on in the PrestaShop Project in July 2023. It was a good month with over 340 merged pull requests! ðŸŽ‰ Even during the Summer we see a lot of great progress in the PrestaShop Project. In July, we merged over 340 pull requests. We welcomed three new committers: Guyomar Alexis (@ga-devfront) ClÃ©ment DÃ©siles (@jokesterfr) Morgan Pichat (@M0rgan01) You can see all current project members on the updated People and Roles page on the project’s website.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on July 19th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 01:51 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:37 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 14:39 Demo: enable WebP or Avif in PrestaShop 8.1 20:21 Demo: enable developer mode with cookie in PrestaShop 9.0 24:14 Demo: RectorPHP in PrestaShop 9.0 29:06 Demo: changes in the developer documentation 38:52 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing July PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The seventh Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, July 19th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. If you have questions related to the open source project, feel free to let us know in advance using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - June
item.description: The new PrestaShop 8.1, ongoing work on PrestaShop 9.0, new content in the developer documentation and more! Read about all this news in the Core Monthly report for June. PrestaShop 8.1 is out! You read that right! The new PrestaShop 8.1 is out! ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations to the whole PrestaShop project team, contributors and community members who made this release possible. Version 8.1 is a minor upgrade, with major improvements. The all-new product management page, full support for WebP and Avif and lots of other improvements are waiting for you.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - June 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the sixth time this year and streamed live on June 21st, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 03:00 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:33 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 06:36 Demo: issue management in the PrestaShop project by @hibatallahAouadni 22:22 Demo: PrestaShop 9.0 roadmap by @fabienvallon 32:20 Demo: breaking changes & improvements in PrestaShop 9.0 by @boherm 47:14 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing June PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The sixth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, June 21st, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes made in the developer documentation, and present two demos: Issue management in the PrestaShop Project by @hibatallahAouadni PrestaShop 9.0 roadmap by @fabienvallon Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - May 2023
item.description: In May, we released PrestaShop 8.1 RC1, shared some exciting news about PrestaShop 9, and continued improving the core and the modules. Let’s take a closer look at recent developments in the project in May. Live Update The last Live Update took place on May 17th. You can read all the details in the summary. We didn’t share the date of the next Live Update back then, but we agreed now that we will host the next session on June 21st.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - May 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the fifth time this year and streamed live on May 17th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:07 Project news: PrestaShop 8.0.4 and 1.7.8.9 releases 03:06 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 is ready for translation 04:47 Project news: two new interviews with the community 05:30 Project news: Classic theme and PrestaShop 9.0 09:09 Project news: minimum PHP compatibility for PrestaShop 9.

item.title: Announcing May PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The fifth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, May 17th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes made in the developer documentation, and share some exciting news about PrestaShop 9.0. Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - April 2023
item.description: As we enter May, let’s recap the key accomplishments within the PrestaShop project during April. We focused on vital security upgrades, namely PrestaShop 8.0.4 and 1.7.8.9, as well as putting the final touches on PrestaShop 8.1. A new project organization was also introduced, and the developer documentation received several updates. Read on to learn more about the latest developments in the PrestaShop project. New project organization On April 19th, 2023, @eternoendless unveiled “a clearer, more transparent, more collaborative organization” for the project, that has been under development for the past few months.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - March 2023
item.description: In this Core Monthly, most important topics include new patch releases for PrestaShop 8, improvements in the developer documentation, data transparency policy, and more. Discover the latest updates on our ongoing projects and catch up on what our project members have been working on throughout the month of March. Patch releases for PrestaShop 8 Two new versions for PrestaShop 8 are now available. 8.0.2 and 8.0.3 versions were both released a few weeks ago.
